lead_paragraph: Judge Merrick B. Garland, President Obama’s Supreme Court nominee, has advanced as a centrist in a city where ambition is often rewarded when accompanied by partisan loyalty.

byline.original: By SHERYL GAY STOLBERG, MATT APUZZO and KATHARINE Q. SEELYE

headline.print_headline: Obama Court Choice Is Deft Navigator of Washington’s Legal Circles
headline.main: Merrick Garland Is a Deft Navigator of Washington’s Legal Circles

snippet: Judge Merrick B. Garland, President Obama’s Supreme Court nominee, has advanced as a centrist in a city where ambition is often rewarded when accompanied by partisan loyalty.
abstract: Merrick B Garland, Pres Obama's nominee to Supreme Court, has proven himself deft navigator of Washington's elite legal circles for decades; colleagues describe man with exceptionally sharp mind and ability to find points of consensus and win friends, while being relatively unswayed by partisanship.
